attributes.action: Potition the Queen please dissolve parliament
attributes.additional_details: We the people, need your help to form a Government.  Our Politian's are locked in a battle over the result of a 17.4 Million Majority to leave the European Union.  On behalf of all who Signed, Please dissolve Parliament..  Your Subject..
attributes.background: Our Parliament is Constitutionally locked on leaving the EU.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's not clear what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

Under the Fixed Terms Parliament Act 2011 the Queen cannot dissolve Parliament. 

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/264215
